title: highly compatible
info: Easy to use and works well with all major computer brands, gaming consoles and mobile devices. Plug & play, no installation or driver needed.

title: wireless with bluetooth
info: Powerful 2.4G RF technology allows you to connect the cordless keyoard from up to 30ft away. Simply plug the unifying receiver into your computer.

title: high capacity battery
info: Equipped with a long-lasting build-in battery, you'll never have to spend a dime on replaceable ones. Enjoy 40 hours of usage time between charges.

title: rgb backlit modes
info: Choose from 4 backlight brightness levels and adjustable breathing speed. Each key glows intensely in the dark and helps you type in low light conditions.
